MR No. 1384 - Trust God, He Will Set Things Right; Problems in the Publishing Work; Blessings of God

     (Written from St. Helena, California, June, 1901, to "My dear son Edson.") 


     I am again much burdened as I see you selecting words from writings that I have sent you, and using them to force decisions that the brethren do not regard with clearness. I have received letters from Elder Daniells and Elder Kilgore asking me to send them instruction at once, if I have any light in reference to the points you have quoted from my letters.
